tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"烁光新星","italic": false,"color":"white"}',Lore:['[{"text":"按 ","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"[","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.swapOffhand","color":"white"},{"text":"]","color":"white"}, " 激发一团持续 4 秒、向准心方向移动的星光，"]','{"text":"它的移动速度会由快到慢，直到前进 21 米后静止。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"它会持续对半径 3.5 米内的敌方造成 6 点伤害与 4 秒","color":"gray","italic": false}','[{"text":"发光","color":"gray","underlined": true,"italic": false},{"text":"效果。","color":"gray","underlined": false},{"text":"（高亮其轮廓，使隐形生物显形）","color":"dark_gray","underlined": false}]','""','[{"text":"在其消失前，再按 ","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"[","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.swapOffhand","color":"white"},{"text":"]","color":"white"}, " 会将你传送到星光所在的位置并"]','{"text":"重置摔落伤害。此后星光会立即消失并进入冷却。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"星光的剩余持续时间会在经验槽显示。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"6 秒 (白昼)","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":" / 12 秒 (夜晚)","italic": false,"color":"dark_gray"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
